terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.fullContent:
Last Updated: January 1, 2026

1. INTRODUCTION AND ACCEPTANCE
These Terms are a legal agreement between you and TacticIQ.

2. VIRTUAL ITEMS
Points and XP cannot be converted to real money.

3. INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY
All rights belong to TacticIQ.

4. CONTACT
legal@tacticiq.app

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.fullContent:
Last Updated: January 1, 2026

1. DATA COLLECTION
We process device ID, IP, location and activity data.

2. YOUR RIGHTS
You can request deletion of your data.

3. CONTACT
privacy@tacticiq.app

cookies.fullContent:

We use cookies to improve your experience.

2. COOKIE TYPES

- Functional
- Analytics
- Marketing

3. MANAGEMENT
